text:
Roeland Park is a city in Johnson County, Kansas, United States. It is part of the Kansas City metropolitan area. In 2010, 6,731 people lived there.
Geography.
Roeland Park is at (39.034705, −94.639211). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it land.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 6,731 people, 3,065 households, and 1,732 families living in Roeland Park.
Education.
The city is part of the Shawnee Mission School District.
Roesland Elementary School, St. Agnes Elementary School and Bishop Miege High School are in Roeland Park.
